text: 3|30|ovvor atmavum tan ceyta nanmaikalaiyum, tan ceyta timaikalaiyum tanakku mun kanum nalil (tukkittu) tanakkum, tan ceyta timaikalukkum itaiyil ninta turam iruntirukka ventume? Enru virumpum. Akave, allah unkalukkut tannaipparri (accamutti) eccarikkai ceykiran. (Enenral,) allah (tan) atiyarkalitam mikka irakkamutaiyavan avan
